creature.name: deer
creature.description: You see a defenseless deer, do not have fear of it.

creature.name: crab
creature.description: You see a little crab that comes from the beach, be careful of its pincers.

creature.name: rat
creature.description: You see a small rat that seems to be extremely hungry.

creature.name: mouse
creature.description: You see a small mouse that seems to be very hungry.

creature.name: chick
creature.description: You see a little chick, it doesn't like to be away from its mother.

creature.name: piglet
creature.description: You see a piglet, a bit dirty.

creature.name: bat
creature.description: You see a bat, it will seek your blood, don't be distracted...

creature.name: chicken
creature.description: You see a chicken, isn't it nice?.

creature.name: mother hen
creature.description: You see a mother hen, she will probably hurt you if you touch her sons.

creature.name: caverat
creature.description: You see a caverat, they are dirty and love the dungeons.

creature.name: penguin
creature.description: You see a penguin, smart, and silly.

creature.name: pigeon
creature.description: You see a pigeon, they love the little seeds.

creature.name: monkey
creature.description: You see a monkey, would you like to offer it a banana?

creature.name: boar
creature.description: You see a boar, they are pretty wild!

creature.name: ram
creature.description: You see a ram, maybe are you able to shear it?

creature.name: wolf
creature.description: You see a wolf, they are wild and very hungry!

creature.name: big bad wolf
creature.description: You see a wolf, they are wild and very hungry!

creature.name: fox
creature.description: You see a fox, they are becoming extinct!

creature.name: beaver
creature.description: You see a beaver, they like to build dams in the river.

creature.name: cow
creature.description: You see a cow, taste her delicious milk.

creature.name: goat
creature.description: You see a goat, they are wild and live in the mountain.

creature.name: horse
creature.description: You see funny horse, don't slap it or it will run away!

creature.name: white horse
creature.description: You see a white horse, they love to stay with their brown friends.

creature.name: gnome
creature.description: You see a gnome, they live in the mountains.

creature.name: mage gnome
creature.description: You see a mage gnome, she cleans the dirty mountain.

creature.name: caiman
creature.description: You see a caiman, they are hidden in the water.

creature.name: babybear
creature.description: You see a babybear, isn't it sweet?

creature.name: panda
creature.description: You see a panda, they came from an exotic land.

creature.name: bull
creature.description: You see a bull, run away!!!

creature.name: grass snake
creature.description: You see a grass snake, they are pretty dangerous.

creature.name: snake
creature.description: You see a snake, it came from the forest to poison you!

creature.name: bear
creature.description: You see a bear, you are lucky and found it awake.

creature.name: lion
creature.description: You see a lion, dangerous and hungry...

creature.name: goblin
creature.description: You see a goblin, it is an evil and mischievous creature.

creature.name: kobold
creature.description: You see a kobold, people says that is a mythical spirit.

creature.name: elephant
creature.description: You see a elephant, a big animal, it's dangerous...

creature.name: venomrat
creature.description: You see a venomrat, extremely poisonous.

creature.name: tiger
creature.description: You see a tiger, they like deer and human meat.

creature.name: infantry gnome
creature.description: You see a infantry gnome, he will protect his little town against the humans!

creature.name: cavalryman gnome
creature.description: You see a cavalryman gnome, they do long travels to search for gold.

creature.name: skeleton
creature.description: You see a skeleton, they survive to get revenge.

creature.name: gargoyle
creature.description: You see a gargoyle, you should think that it is a statue, but no, it is alive!

creature.name: young beholder
creature.description: You see a young beholder, with his big eye you can't hide from him!

noise.value: Defend yourself! I can see you!

creature.name: zombie rat
creature.description: You see a hungry zombie rat, they won't like to see you.

creature.name: veteran goblin
creature.description: You see a veteran goblin, an old warrior...

creature.name: soldier kobold
creature.description: You see a soldier kobold, he's protecting his king.

creature.name: killer bat
creature.description: You see a killer bat, it will suck your blood!

creature.name: green slime
creature.description: You see a green slime, sticky and shiny.

creature.name: archer kobold
creature.description: You see an archer kobold, they run away from the humans.

creature.name: black bear
creature.description: You see a strong black bear, they hibernate in winter.

creature.name: elder gargoyle
creature.description: You see an elder gargoyle, they are wise...

creature.name: razorrat
creature.description: You see a razorrat, his noise will make you crazy!

creature.name: leprechaun
creature.description: You see a leprechaun, you would be lucky if found their treasure.

noise.value: They're always after my Lucky Charms!!
Clovers and rainbows... stars and horseshoes...

creature.name: cyclops
creature.description: You see a cyclops, they just have one eye!

creature.name: beholder
creature.description: You see a beholder, they can see you very well with that big eye...

creature.name: soldier goblin
creature.description: You see a soldier goblin, a young warrior.

creature.name: veteran kobold
creature.description: You see a veteran kobold, they are mighty!

creature.name: troll
creature.description: You see a troll, be careful in his terrain.

creature.name: orc
creature.description: You see a orc, he is noisy and silly.

creature.name: dark gargoyle
creature.description: You see a dark gargoyle, are you feeling the fear?

creature.name: littlefairy
creature.description: You see a littlefairy, they are magic and nice.

creature.name: ogre
creature.description: You see an ogre, they are nude and rude!

creature.name: mummy
creature.description: You see a mummy, they usually sleep in a coffin.

creature.name: clurichaun
creature.description: You see a clurichaun, they are rich, but you don't know if you are able to search his gold!

noise.value: Join me for a drink, lassie?

creature.name: risecia thug
creature.description: You see a risecia thug, stay away from him!

creature.name: leader kobold
creature.description: You see a leader kobold, one of the mighty warriors.

creature.name: orc warrior
creature.description: You see an orc warrior, they won't like you searching in the mountain.

creature.name: orc hunter
creature.description: You see an orc hunter, they are seeking for you!

creature.name: risecia archer
creature.description: You see a risecia archer, just one of the warriors who want to protect his chief.

creature.name: ghost
creature.description: You see a ghost, don't be afraid! They don't seem to be evil.

creature.name: giantrat
creature.description: You see a giantrat, they are like an experiment gone wrong!

creature.name: elf
creature.description: You see an elf, they love the forest and live in peace.

creature.name: tiny skelly
creature.description: You see a tiny skelly, they are silly, little and evil, be careful with his poison...

creature.name: dwarf
creature.description: You see a dwarf, they just work in the mines to find some gold for us.

creature.name: ratman
creature.description: You see a ratman, they are a mutation that comes from old times.

noise.value: You, humans, never leave us alone!

creature.name: ratwoman
creature.description: You see a ratwoman, they are a mutation of the women with the rats in the century XVIII.

noise.value: You humans never leave us alone!

creature.name: elder beholder
creature.description: You see an elder beholder, his nasty eye will scare you.

creature.name: crocodile
creature.description: You see a crocodile, it arises from the deep waters in the rivers.

creature.name: frogman
creature.description: You see a frogman, living in a lake not very deep.

creature.name: brown slime
creature.description: You see a brown slime, sticky and hungry.

creature.name: venom gargoyle
creature.description: You see a venom gargoyle, a hideous and poisonous creature.

creature.name: bloody zombie
creature.description: You see a bloody zombie, can you see the drops of blood that fall from his body?

creature.name: red troll
creature.description: You see a red troll, he's burning with anger.

creature.name: elder ogre
creature.description: You see an elder ogre, he's in the last moments of his life, take pity on him.

creature.name: risecia swordsman
creature.description: You see a risecia swordsman, The blade of his sword will cut your head!

creature.name: orc chief
creature.description: You see an orc chief, he is too busy to attend to you!

creature.name: militia elf
creature.description: You see a militia elf, they train hard to beat you!

creature.name: dwarf guardian
creature.description: You see a dwarf guardian, they are making defense against the humans.

creature.name: archer elf
creature.description: You see an archer elf, they can do much damage with their wooden arrows.

creature.name: zombie
creature.description: You see a zombie, they wake up just to take revenge, be silent.

creature.name: elder dwarf
creature.description: You see an elder dwarf, a mighty warrior tired of fighting.

creature.name: vampire bride
creature.description: You see a vampire bride, she was resurrected from the dead by a wicked vampire lord.

creature.name: Chief Falatheen of the Risecia
creature.description: You see the Chief Falatheen of the Risecia, he doesn't want to die! His little warriors are protecting him against invaders.

creature.name: spider
creature.description: You see a spider, they are making a giant spider web to trap you!

creature.name: brain ahouga
creature.description: You see a brain ahouga, a very strange creature only living in your dreams!

creature.name: soldier elf
creature.description: You see a soldier elf, a good partner of the militia elves.

creature.name: headless monster
creature.description: You see a headless monster, how he can hear that we come to him?

creature.name: ogre soldier
creature.description: You see an ogre soldier, smelling like they have not had a bath for years. Ewww.

creature.name: warrior skeleton
creature.description: You see a warrior skeleton, he's just a normal skeleton with a shield!

creature.name: black slime
creature.description: You see a black slime, with a sticky trail behind it.

creature.name: wooden golem
creature.description: You see a wooden golem. The scroll with ancient words in his head keeps it walking.

creature.name: royal mummy
creature.description: You see a royal mummy. You wonder what keeps this king's soul from finding peace.

creature.name: cannibal woman
creature.description: You see a cannibal woman. She wants to make a soup with your bones!

creature.name: archrat
creature.description: You see an archrat. You will be distracted with his aura, be careful...

creature.name: hero dwarf
creature.description: You see a hero dwarf. He is an old dwarf warrior who became a hero for fighting in many dwarf wars and he is very famous for his strength and brutality.

creature.name: mage elf
creature.description: You see a mage elf. She can feel pure magic when she stands outside in the forest and just frees her mind.

creature.name: poisonous spider
creature.description: You see a poisonous spider. Be careful! Its poison is very strong! It will make you very weak and can probably kill you!

noise.value: The end of the world is nigh...

creature.name: rotten zombie
creature.description: You see a rotten zombie. You are disgusted as you see its rotten skin that hangs down in pieces from his half rotten bones.

creature.name: littlewizard
creature.description: You see a littlewizard. He is a child but he is already able to cast powerful spells.

creature.name: kalavan housewife
creature.description: You see a kalavan housewife. She lives in kalavan city and she is very angry with rude people who want to steal her food out of the kitchen and destroy her beautiful flower garden!

creature.name: cannibal
creature.description: You see a cannibal. He is hunting you to cook and eat you! Its useless to tell him that your flesh is not good, better fight him or run away!

creature.name: kalavan peasant
creature.description: You see a kalavan peasant. He works in the fields around kalavan city. As he heard there were strangers in the city he came to help the kalavan citizens in fighting the enemies!

creature.name: kalavan wisewoman
creature.description: You see a kalavan wisewoman. Normally she sits in her small room and does some handworking but now she wants to have some action!

creature.name: kalavan citizen
creature.description: You see a kalavan citizen. He lives in kalavan city and tries to protect it from invaders!

creature.name: leader dwarf
creature.description: You see a leader dwarf. He is the most mighty dwarf of his tribe so he enjoys much popularity there.

creature.name: imperial veteran
creature.description: You see an imperial veteran. He fought in many battles and wars. Now he is old, but over the years he always looked for an new enemy to fight against.

creature.name: disciple assassin
creature.description: You see a disciple assassin. He is quite young but he has learned to fight and kill already.

noise.value: My dad can beat your dad.

creature.name: invisible man
creature.description: You see nothing but the landscape. As you stare at the point where you think you have seen something, you suddenly see the slight contour of a man!

noise.value: My unnatural state should evoke fear in you ...

creature.name: child dark elf
creature.description: You see a child dark elf. You should know that dark elves are already quite strong and intelligent when they are children. Dont think you can fight him so easily!

creature.name: nymph
creature.description: You see a nymph. She loves nature very much! As you take a look at her she feels disturbed in sun-bathing and talking to the birds, perhaps she was best left alone.

creature.name: minotaur
creature.description: You see a minotaur. He escaped from his labyrinth and is very angry now!

noise.value: You will never find the way out!

creature.name: apprentice assassin
creature.description: You see a apprentice assassin. He has been taught some very awesome moves and methods, so he is already able to kill an enemy almost perfectly!

noise.value: You want a piece of me?
We mighty duergars will crush the dwarves!

creature.name: elf wizard
creature.description: You see an elf wizard. He is a very wise elf who knows almost every kind of magic. He likes to use nature spells to make every plant and creature fertile, but he is also able to defend himself when he has to do.

creature.name: unicorn
creature.description: You see a rare unicorn. They are widely believed to be only a myth.

creature.name: green dragon
creature.description: You see a green dragon. His wings may be too small for him to fly with them but nevertheless he looks very strong and his thick green skin seems to protect him quite well.

creature.name: imperial scientist
creature.description: You see an imperial scientist. He is quite clever but also a little bit crazy and unfortunately he uses his intelligence for evil experiments.

creature.name: death knight
creature.description: You see a death knight. Some time ago he fought in tournaments where his only aim was to kill as many enemies as possible.

noise.value: Who wakes me from my meditation?

creature.name: mountain dwarf
creature.description: You see a mountain dwarf. He likes earth, stones and rocks. Deep within the mountain, where no animal and no human has ever been, you can hear the sound of his pickaxe as he searches for gold and ore.

creature.name: centaur
creature.description: You see a noble centaur, half man, half horse. He looks capable of great damage but thankfully seems to mean you no harm.

creature.name: assassin
creature.description: You see an assassin. He is a very good at killing his victims silently without being seen by anyone.

creature.name: mountain dwarf guardian
creature.description: You see a mountain dwarf guardian. He has to watch out for enemies and guards the mountain dwarfs while they are doing their work.

creature.name: djinn
creature.description: You see a djinn. He isnt caught in a bottle or lamp so someone must have let him free and gave him the order to kill you.

noise.value: Think not to defy the dark elves!
Dwarves are the enemy ... but we kill all who cross our path!
I am the king of this area!

creature.name: mountain elder dwarf
creature.description: You see a mountain elder dwarf. For many years he worked deep in the mountain and found much gold and ore in his life. Soon he will be too old to do this work but at the moment he is still a strong dwarf.

creature.name: amazoness archer
creature.description: You see an amazoness archer. She handles her bow quite well and her arrows are very dangerous when she shoots them at you out of the forest!

creature.name: amazoness hunter
creature.description: You see an amazoness hunter. She creeps through the forest to hunt animals. But she doesnt like that you are in her hunting area!

creature.name: vampire lord
creature.description: You see a vampire lord. Be careful, he is after your blood!

creature.name: imp
creature.description: You see an imp. He may look a little bit cute, but dont forget he is one of the devils servants!

creature.name: mountain hero dwarf
creature.description: You see a mountain hero dwarf. Many, many dwarfs admire him! He was a member of a dwarf group who discovered a very big gold deposit!

noise.value: We will never return to the light!

creature.name: blue dragon
creature.description: You see a blue dragon. It has a very beautiful blue skin which shimmers mysteriously in the light. But dont forget that it has also claws and teeth!

creature.name: mountain leader dwarf
creature.description: You see a mountain leader dwarf. He is responsible for the mountain dwarfs and their work, and also for the organization of the guardian troops. But in serious cases he will also fight on his own!

creature.name: incorporeal armor
creature.description: You see an incorporeal armor. You are quite surprised as it walks towards you because there is nobody in it.

creature.name: ent
creature.description: You see an ent. First you think it is a tree but as it begins to walk you get a surprise!

creature.name: werewolf
creature.description: You see a werewolf. Normally he is a human but at fullmoon nights he turns into a dangerous beast! His poison seems to last forever.

creature.name: old ent
creature.description: You see an old ent. He has seen many years passing by and survived a lot of storms. You can see that he is very old because he has already lost all of his leaves and most of his bark is broken...

noise.value: The Spider Queen will avenge me!
I want to grow to be mighty!

creature.name: giant dwarf
creature.description: You see a giant dwarf. It is very hard for him to be a giant dwarf because the some of the other dwarfs dont really see him as one of them because of his height... But in his big heart he is a dwarf and in battle he will fight against every enemy!

creature.name: shadows assassin
creature.description: You see a shadows assassin. He knows how to become one with the shadows and to move in the dark without been seen or making any sound.

creature.name: amazoness vigilance
creature.description: You see an amazoness vigilance. Her senses are well tuned, so you have to be very silent when you dont want her to hear you!

noise.value: Keep away from me, sunlight dweller!
I will summon chaos and fury upon you!
Keep away from me, sunlight dweller!

creature.name: chaos dragonrider
creature.description: You see a chaos dragonrider. He is very well trained in dragon riding, but also on the ground he can fight well.

creature.name: giant spider
creature.description: You see a giant spider. It has very long legs which are quite dangerous.

noise.value: I seek the blood of a Semos Man!

creature.name: twilight slime
creature.description: You see a twilight slime, so strange and beautiful. Why is it coming towards you? Runnnnnnnnn!

noise.value: We might be in hiding, but we are STILL mighty.
You must bow before the Oni Queen.
The Queen of Spiders will take her revenge on you!

creature.name: master assassin
creature.description: You see a master assassin. He is a master of assassination! He is able to kill an enemy without letting him know that he is already there!

noise.value: We are the darkness you fear!

creature.name: elder giant
creature.description: You see an elder giant. For many years he lived alone and had to hide because he was hunted by humans! Now he is old and has decided not to hide any longer because he wants to see something else in his life.

noise.value: You may steal my money but you'll never take my heart!

creature.name: flying golden dragon
creature.description: You see a flying golden dragon. As it spreads its mighty wings you shiver... this mystical creature seems to have much power in it!

noise.value: You will never see the light again!

creature.name: twin headed dragon
creature.description: You see a twin headed dragon. The two heads are staring at you with their four eyes!

noise.value: You WILL show us the respect we deserve.
Care for a game of chess?
Worms will feast on your corpse!

creature.name: ice giant
creature.description: You see an ice giant. His skin is covered with frozen hoarfrost and his breath feels like the cold north wind.

noise.value: Wipe your feet before entering our domain.
I'll teach you to defile our sanctuary.

creature.name: dwarf golem
creature.description: You see a dwarf golem. A long time ago a dwarf got turned into a big rock by some mystical forces. To save their friend the other dwarfs created a golem out of this rock! From this day the dwarf golem lives together with them.

creature.name: thing
creature.description: You see a thing. It looks like a very mutated human and is so scary that you think it has to come from another world.

creature.name: amazoness giant
creature.description: You see an amazoness giant. She looks very beautiful but dont be deceived by that!

noise.value: I am become death, destroyer of worlds.

creature.name: black dragon
creature.description: You see a black dragon. As you see this huge black creature you almost faint! If you concentrate you can feel the deep growling of it in your bones.

creature.name: devil monk
creature.description: You see a devil monk. He is member of a devil cult which practises black rituals.

creature.name: fallen angel
creature.description: You see a fallen angel. When he turned away from good, he fell down from heaven.

noise.value: I am here to destroy all people.
Leave me now, before it is too late!

creature.name: angel
creature.description: You see an angel. With his flame sword he guards the way and doesnt let you pass.

creature.name: black death
creature.description: You see black death. With his scythe he reaps your soul and then he takes it over the river where it has to stay until judgement day.

noise.value: Your time to die has come!

creature.name: Lord Durin
creature.description: You see the mighty Lord Durin, an ancient dwarf who has led his race through countless battles.

creature.name: archangel
creature.description: You see an archangel. She wants to kill you because she doesnt want you in the clouds.

noise.value: Leave now, before it is too late for you.
Neither the earth nor the sky has a place for you...

creature.name: pegasus
creature.description: You see Pegasus, the winged horse. His name means Lightning and he carries bolts of Thunder.

creature.name: arachne
creature.description: You see Arachne, a horrid half woman half spider. With so many legs she can hit you very fast, and her poisonous bite is fierce.

creature.name: balrog
creature.description: You see a huge balrog. He is slow hitting, but terribly strong as he stands towering above you.

noise.value: My will be done over land and sky!
Mine is the Power and the Glory!

creature.name: golden death
creature.description: You see the golden death. He came to take away your soul to pay for all your sins.

noise.value: You will dream of me tonight...
You will pay for your greed!
I will strike you down with more power than you can imagine!!

creature.name: madaram pawn
creature.description: You see a pawn for a game of chess. It will reward nothing if killed.

creature.name: chaos pawn
creature.description: You see a pawn for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram rook
creature.description: You see a rook for a game of chess. It will scarcely reward you to kill it.

creature.name: chaos rook
creature.description: You see a rook for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram knight
creature.description: You see a knight, a chess piece. He won't reward you if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos knight
creature.description: You see a knight for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram bishop
creature.description: You see a bishop for a game of chess. It will reward you nothing if you slay it.

creature.name: chaos bishop
creature.description: You see a bishop for a game of chess. He will not reward you if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram king
creature.description: You see a king to play chess with, he will reward you nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos king
creature.description: You see a king of a game of chess. He will reward nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram queen
creature.description: You see a queen piece for a game of chess. She will reward nothing if you kill her.

creature.name: chaos queen
creature.description: You see a queen piece for a game of chess. She will reward nothing if you kill her.
